item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! I’m Smriti Suresh, a 23 year old grad student currently in the second year of my Master’s degree in Computer Science at Boston University. I am passionate about Natural Language Processing and all things data. After obtaining my Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science & Engineering from Mahindra Ecole Centrale (now Mahindra University) in Hyderabad, India, I knew I wanted to delve into the intricacies of how natural language and computing combine to produce mind-boggling results (GenAI is insane right now :o).
